Module cincuentazo
Package cincuentazo.model.player

Class PlayerAdapter

java.lang.Object
cincuentazo.model.player.PlayerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Player
public abstract class PlayerAdapter extends Object implements IPlayer
Adapter class that provides default implementations of IPlayer. Subclasses can override only the methods they need.
